pages.title: Thulite Ore
pages.text: Shiny pink ore that can be processed into ingots and blocks. Also useful for various crafting recipes.
It can be found underground anywhere in the Iridescent Plains, at around Y levels 80 all the way to -64.$(br2)The most common areas seem to be around Y level -10.

pages.title: Thulite Clusters
pages.text: There are also interesting growths of Thulite in certain pink biomes that crystal deer love to munch on.
